title: HelpForestProject
author: HelpForestProject
content: https://helpforesttoken.com: a new token to help the Amazon and climate changeThe Amazon is the lungs of our planet, and its protection is essential to fight climate change. However, the Amazon is being threatened by deforestation, illegal logging, and agriculture.HelpForestToken is a new token that aims to help protect the Amazon and fight climate change. The token is based on blockchain technology, which allows users to make transactions securely and efficiently.HelpForestToken will be used to fund reforestation and conservation projects in the Amazon. Users can buy HelpForestToken and use them to support these projects.The token will also be used to raise awareness about the importance of protecting the Amazon. Users can use HelpForestToken to participate in awareness-raising and education campaigns about climate change.How HelpForestToken will help the AmazonHelpForestToken will help the Amazon in the following ways:Fund reforestation projects: HelpForestToken will be used to fund reforestation projects in the Amazon. These projects will plant new trees and restore degraded forests.Support biodiversity conservation: HelpForestToken will be used to support biodiversity conservation in the Amazon. These projects will protect the animal and plant species that live in the forest.Raise awareness about climate change: HelpForestToken will be used to raise awareness about the importance of protecting the Amazon and fighting climate change. These efforts will educate people about the impact of deforestation and illegal logging on the Amazon.ConclusionHelpForestToken is a new token with the potential to help the Amazon and fight climate change. The token is based on blockchain technology, which allows users to make transactions securely and efficiently.HelpForestToken will be used to fund reforestation and conservation projects in the Amazon. The token will also be used to raise awareness about the importance of protecting the Amazon.The HelpForestToken community is committed to protecting the Amazon and fighting climate change. The token has the potential to make a real difference in the world.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Not a chance. The token was just created to make the creators rich and not actually saving the Amazon forest or affect climate change. Just look through the past failed tokens and ICO projects, at least not less than 10 of them possibly talked about trying to stop climate change or something like that, but today they are no way to be seen after collecting money from people.

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: Just go to the site to make sure that this is a 100% scam project. I agree with the comment above, such projects are created only to enrich the creators and do not pursue any charitable goals. One of the main indicators is the absence of a public team.

comments.author: HelpForestProject
comments.body: You are totally wrong. I guarantee that the token was created by trying to reforest the forests. This project is totally true. I can guarantee it since I am the one who created the token. This project is verified with all my personal information, my home address and passport.

comments.author: HelpForestProject
comments.body: If this token seems like a scam to you, then would you prefer to invest in a meme token? and it has the team at the end of the page.

comments.author: Ms_Mining
comments.body: Quote from: HelpForestProject on November 19, 2023, 04:26:43 PMYou are totally wrong. I guarantee that the token was created by trying to reforest the forests. This project is totally true. I can guarantee it since I am the one who created the token. This project is verified with all my personal information, my home address and passport.This "guarantee" is ridiculous.

comments.author: HelpForestProject
comments.body: In life you never know something is good until you try it.You don't know if a person is good until you give them the opportunity to show it.

comments.author: qwertyup23
comments.body: There are just too many inconsistencies with your team page profile which makes me believe that this is NOT a genuine project. My reason are as follows:First, the team member "Rokya" is clearly a female but she was described as a "male" with the use of pronouns of HIM and HE. In addition, you labeled her as a software developer but she is a graphic and image designer.Second, Huy Hoang's information is named as "Anita" instead of his name Huy based on his profile. Upon checking his photo, he is a graphic designer for fiverr. I really doubt that he has something to do with the project. Lastly, you have an anonymous team member and if you click on any of the social media accounts that they respectively have, you will just be transferred on the website itself.Though these evidences are not 101% conclusive that this is a scam project, it is enough for me or for the average audience to mark this as a red flag if they plan on investing.REFERENCE:https://www.fiverr.com/rokya_bokulhttps://www.fiverr.com/huydesignervn

comments.author: HelpForestProject
comments.body: Just because of you does it have to be a fraud? These problems will be rectified, the problems are that they were translated from Spanish to English, sorry if the translator misinterpreted the writing.The project is 100% real and is supported with my money and the volunteers so far the trees that were planted and the money that was invested are our money so if this token is not successful we will continue using our money to do good,There are projects that offer nothing 0 and do nothing like memes and other tokens that have no photos of the team and nothing, and even so people invest, we deserve everything that happens to us, when someone tries to do well we get critical and with the projects engenieros we support them

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: The Brazilian government already receives money from a fund created precisely for this purpose, and the situation in the Amazon is getting worse every day. The problem with the Amazon is not the lack of money, it is the corruption of those who manage it. The day this issue is taken seriously, we will no longer have so many concerns.

comments.author: HelpForestProject
comments.body: There are already people who take it seriously but no one supports them because of the big companies that steal non-stop.
